thread.title: Mike Francesa gets crying Mets fan a ticket to Game 3 vs. Los Angeles Dodgers (AUDIO)
thread.title_full: Mike Francesa gets crying Mets fan a ticket to Game 3 vs. Los Angeles Dodgers (AUDIO)

author: Charles Curtis | For NJ Advance Media
title: Mike Francesa gets crying Mets fan a ticket to Game 3 vs. Los Angeles Dodgers (AUDIO)
text:
By now, you may be familiar with viral sensation Will from Queens, the die-hard Mets fan who turned out to be a cry-hard Mets fan on Mike Francesa's WFAN show on Sunday. 
It turned out Will wanted to get back on the phone (see above, via @RNs_Funhouse ) with Francesa and explain his side of the story (he said he has "God in his life"), while the host said he was only kidding when he expressed concern for the bawling caller. 
PLUS: Francesa loses it trying to explain Mets' rotation to fan (AUDIO) 
Then, Francesa made an incredible offer: He told Will to go to Citi Field to meet a Francesa associate, who would give him a ticket to sit next to the WFAN host himself on Monday night for Game 3 . 
When Francesa revealed he invited Will to sit behind home plate with him, there was nothing but shocked silence, so Francesa said what we were all thinking a few seconds later: "Don't cry again now, Will!" 
Follow Charles Curtis on Twitter @charlescurtis82 . Find NJ.com on Facebook
